meanings.definition: A member of the rabbit family.
meanings.sent1: Leporids are known for their long ears and fluffy tails.
meanings.sent2: The leporids in the meadow hopped around playfully.
meanings.sent3: Why did the leporids organize a hopping competition? To see who had the best bounce!
meanings.sent4: The field was a sea of leporids, their movements like a synchronized dance.
meanings.sent5: Children love reading stories about magical leporids who can talk and grant wishes.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of rabbits.
meanings.sent1: The leporids burrowed deep into the ground to create their cozy homes.
meanings.sent2: The fluffy tail is a leporids' distinctive feature.
meanings.sent3: The leporids threw a carrot party to celebrate their love for veggies.
meanings.sent4: Her swift movements were as agile as a leporids darting through the grass.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with the delightful scent of leporids nibbling on fresh greens.
